ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Voyager 2 48-s Triaxial Fluxgate Magnetometer (MAG) Magnetic Field Data Near and Beyond Termination Shock in CDF Format
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: L.F. Burlaga, Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator, N.F. Ness of the Bartol Research Institute, University of Delaware, and the NASA National Space Science Data Center (NSSDC) for usage of data from this site in publications and presentations.

InformationURL.Name: COHOWeb Service
InformationURL.Description: Voyager 2 merged Magnetic Field and Ephemeris Data from COHOWeb

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via ftp from SPDF.

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via http from SPDF.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: L.F. Burlaga, Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator, N.F. Ness of the Bartol Research Institute, University of Delaware, and the NASA National Space Science Data Center (NSSDC) for usage of data from this site in publications and presentations. Please acknowledge the data providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Time, Ephemeris
Parameter.Description: Time, Beginning of the Interval, Ephemeris
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft ID
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH

Parameter.Name: B Field Magnitude
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Magnitude, B, Average of Fine Scale Magnitudes

Parameter.Name: BR in RTN Coordinates
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Radial Component, BR, in Radial-Tangential-Normal, RTN, Coordinates

Parameter.Name: BT in RTN Coordinates
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Tangential Component, BT, in Radial-Tangential-Normal, RTN, Coordinates

Parameter.Name: BN in RTN Coordinates
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Normal Component, BN, in Radial-Tangential-Normal, RTN, Coordinates

Parameter.Name: Uncertainty in B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH

Parameter.Name: Uncertainty in BR
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Radial Component, BR, Uncertainty in Radial-Tangential-Normal, RTN, Coordinates

Parameter.Name: Uncertainty in BT
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Tangential Component, BT, Uncertainty in Radial-Tangential-Normal, RTN, Coordinates

Parameter.Name: Uncertainty in BN
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Normal Component, BN, Uncertainty in Radial-Tangential-Normal, RTN, Coordinates

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Heliographic Radius
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH_EPHEM

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Heliographic Latitude
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH_EPHEM

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Heliographic Longitude
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH_EPHEM

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Heliographic Inertial Longitude
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH_EPHEM
